attributes.action: All currently sitting MPs should be banned from seeking re-election.
attributes.additional_details: Political manoeuvring over last two years has brought us no closer to a sensible, considered, and balanced exit from the EU. The fact that we have arrived at 29/3/19 without agreement amongst our political parties gives rise to serious doubt about their ability to govern.
attributes.background: We are being badly served by our elected representatives, irrespective of party. The current situation, and uncertainty,  as to the means of leaving (or not), the EU, is unacceptable to the majority of the British public.
